description: The user asks for a two‑week study plan that adds review sessions for material covered two weeks ago in Chemistry and History. The assistant fetches the user's academic calendar, upcoming assignments, and energy profile, then generates a personalized schedule and presents it.

messages.content: You are StudySync Scheduler, an AI‑driven personal study scheduling assistant. Use the provided tools to sync the user’s calendar, fetch upcoming assignments, analyse their energy profile, and generate an optimal study timetable with reminders.
Hey, I need a study plan for the next two weeks that includes review sessions for the material we covered two weeks ago in Chemistry and History.
Sure! I’ll gather your class schedule, upcoming assignments, and energy‑level data, then craft a customized timetable that fits your preferred study rhythm.

Great, I have your calendar, upcoming assignments, and your high‑energy windows. I’ll now generate a study timetable that:
- Reserves 50‑minute focused sessions with 10‑minute breaks.
- Limits total study time to 5 hours per day.
- Includes dedicated review slots for Chemistry (covering the lecture from 9 Dec) and History (covering the seminar from 10 Dec).
Let’s build the schedule.

{"timetable":[{"date":"2025-12-09","sessions":[{"title":"Chemistry Review (lecture notes)","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"},{"title":"Chemistry Lab Report – drafting","start":"13:00","end":"13:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-10","sessions":[{"title":"History Review (seminar slides)","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"},{"title":"History Essay – outline","start":"13:00","end":"13:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-11","sessions":[{"title":"Chemistry Lab Report – data analysis","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"},{"title":"Problem Set 5 – questions 1‑3","start":"13:00","end":"13:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-12","sessions":[{"title":"Math Tutorial follow‑up","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"},{"title":"History Essay – writing","start":"13:00","end":"13:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-13","sessions":[{"title":"Problem Set 5 – remaining questions","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"},{"title":"Chemistry Lab Report – final edits","start":"13:00","end":"13:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-14","sessions":[{"title":"Physics Lab review (post‑lab)","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"},{"title":"History Essay – proofreading","start":"13:00","end":"13:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-15","sessions":[{"title":"Chemistry Lab Report – submission","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-16","sessions":[{"title":"History Essay – final polish","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-17","sessions":[{"title":"Catch‑up / buffer","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-18","sessions":[{"title":"Catch‑up / buffer","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-19","sessions":[{"title":"Review upcoming quiz material","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-20","sessions":[{"title":"History Essay – final submission","start":"08:00","end":"08:50"}]}]}

Here’s your personalized two‑week study timetable (all times are in your local timezone):

**December 9** – Chemistry Review (lecture notes) 08:00‑08:50, Chemistry Lab Report – drafting 13:00‑13:50
**December 10** – History Review (seminar slides) 08:00‑08:50, History Essay – outline 13:00‑13:50
**December 11** – Chemistry Lab Report – data analysis 08:00‑08:50, Problem Set 5 – Q1‑3 13:00‑13:50
**December 12** – Math Tutorial follow‑up 08:00‑08:50, History Essay – writing 13:00‑13:50
**December 13** – Problem Set 5 – remaining questions 08:00‑08:50, Chemistry Lab Report – final edits 13:00‑13:50
**December 14** – Physics Lab review 08:00‑08:50, History Essay – proofreading 13:00‑13:50
**December 15** – Chemistry Lab Report – submission 08:00‑08:50
**December 16** – History Essay – final polish 08:00‑08:50
**December 17‑18** – Catch‑up / buffer slots (use if anything overruns) 08:00‑08:50 each day
**December 19** – Review upcoming quiz material 08:00‑08:50
**December 20** – History Essay – final submission 08:00‑08:50

All sessions are 50 minutes long with a 10‑minute break after each, respecting your max of 5 hours of study per day. I’ve placed the review sessions during your high‑energy windows (08:00‑10:00, 13:00‑15:00, 19:00‑21:00).

I’ll send you a push notification 15 minutes before each session starts. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or if you’d prefer a different session length!
